title: EUIPO - Certificate of Trade Mark Registration
description: Schema of a certificate of trade mark registration

credentialSubject.description: Defines additional information about the subject that is described by the Verifiable Attestation

expirationDate.description: 186 Expected expiration date of the renewal

exhibition.description: 230 Name of the exhibition and date of the first display (priority under Article 38 EUTMR)

filingLanguage.description: 270 Language in which the application is filed and second language

priorityClaim.description: 300 Country, date and number of the application for which priority is claimed

seniority.description: 350 Seniority: country; (a) registration number; (b) registration date; (c) filing date; (d) date of priority

previousPublication.description: 400 Date(s), number(s) and section(s)/heading(s) of previous publication(s) in the EUTM Bulletin

applicationPublicationDate.description: 442 Date of publication of the application in the EUTM Bulletin

registrationPublicationDate.description: 450 Date of publication of the registration in the EUTM Bulletin

acquisition.description: 521 Acquisition of distinctive character by use

reproduction.description: 541 Reproduction of the trade mark in standard script

reproductionNonStandard.description: 546 Reproduction of the trade mark in non-standard script

otherMark.description: 559 Other mark (including position mark, pattern mark, motion mark and multimedia mark)

cancellation.description: 580 Date and number of the entry of the cancellation

originalApplication.description: 641 Number and date of the original application

transformation.description: 646 Transformation: number of the international registration designating the Union cancelled; (a) date of the international registration or (if applicable) of the subsequent designation; (b) date of priority of the international registration (if applicable)

applicantNameAndAddress.description: 732 Name and address of the applicant

representativeNameAndAddress.description: 740 Name and address of the representative
